description.summary:
Class Error contains information about an error returned from the request:
InnerException:
Momento.Sdk.Exceptions.SdkException specific exception object.
ErrorCode:
Momento.Sdk.Exceptions.MomentoErrorCode value for the error.
Message:
A detailed error message.

Base class for capturing information about errors that occur during Momento API calls.
message:
string describing the error.
transportDetails:
Low-level information about the error, potentially including wire-level status information.
Class Success indicates that the request that generated it was successful.
Class Hit contains the results of a cache hit.
Class Miss contains the results of a cache miss.
